Text:
Show the Benchmark UI (in game: Esc -> Benchmark).
Certain code are injected to the game and will cause the game to run slower.
Please restart the game after changing this setting.

Control the actions of your characters. One of the top performance hogs. Delaying this would cause characters to not change their actions immediately. I would not recommend delaying this without testing as it may reduce your worker's productivity.

Control the pathfinding of your characters when they move.
Delaying this may cause characters to not react to pathfinding changes immediately.

Control the finishing of the construction of your buildings.
Delaying this would cause buildings that are supposed to be finished to not finish immediately.

Control the reachability of the Builder Job.
Delaying this would cause the Builders status to not be able to reach the construction site immediately.

Control the counting of resources in the game.
Delaying this would cause the resource counters to not be updated as frequent.

Benchmark is running ({0}s left).
You should not have paused the game until it finishes to avoid skewing the results.
You can stop it now and try again later.

Measure how long each components takes to run. Choose the duration to gather data for. After clicking 'Start Benchmark', try not to pause the game until it finishes to avoid skewing the results. You can, however, change the game speed to any speed you want to know the performance at. If the game is paused, it will be automatically resumed once you click this button. After the benchmark is finished, this dialog will automatically open again.
